title: How to increase my social interaction - Quora

response.answer_text: To increase your social interaction quotient, you need to get out of your comfort zone.. I agree that its pretty difficult to get out of that zone, but when you put yourself in that situation, you’ll know what to do… Below are the topics/questions that you can start off to ensure that conversation hits off. How’s life, How’s education, How’s everything in the family?Their hobbies, what did they do in the last 1 or 2 days?Anything exciting which happened with them?You can share thoughts from your side too…You can generally talk about some topics such as Politics, Bikes, Cars, general happenings around the world, space and any other useless topics…Just get out of that comfort zone and try to be interactive by putting yourself in uncomfortable situations…. Hope that helps…
